thread.title: Publicis Cuts Full-Year Revenue Outlook
thread.title_full: Publicis Cuts Full-Year Revenue Outlook - WSJ

author: Nick Kostov
title: Publicis Cuts Full-Year Revenue Outlook
text:
PARIS—Publicis Groupe SA on Thursday cut its full-year sales outlook as the French advertising company said an unusually large number of clients, particularly in the U.S., downsized accounts and postponed or canceled advertising campaigns.
Publicis said organic revenue—a closely tracked figure in the industry that strips out acquisitions, disposals and exchange moves—rose just 0.7% in the three months to Sept. 30, dragged down by... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
